short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get cookie from your favorite website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you having hard time to copy cookies?
This extension maybe your choice to solve that problem.

# Feature
1. Get all cookie from any website, include private and public cookies
2. Display all cookies in one click
3. Copy cookies as text with one button

# Example Usage
When you want to download private YT videos using popular command tools (ex: 
youtube-dl), you need to supply cookies to allow downloader to get your downloadable link. You can used this extension to direct copy your cookies as string.
